places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Raj Palace
address: Kota Rd, Civil Line, Baran, Rajasthan 325205, India

reviews.text: Overall the hotel stay was good.  The room size is big with nice interior.  Cleanliness is good.  The hotel has ample four wheeler parking space.  Service is o.  Although it can be improved with professionalism, this JVVNL office is close to Kota Baran main road,

This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed. No backup did not work.
Room service is the worst room attended always tries to open the door on their own even if the door is locked.
No facility at all.
This is just a marriage place and they have build up the stay.
Place is not worth staying its simply waist of money and your temper.
I stayed here for 2 nights and did not felt safe at all for single moment

Nice hotel at very good location, rooms are well made, all facilities are good, parking is good, very good place for marriage, birthday, anniversary party, environment is also very good, service is good

Worst hotel that ever stayed in. The rooms, bed and bedsheet were very dirty. The balcony doors do not lock, so you always feel unsafe sleeping inside the rooms. The staff is very rude, and they don't even bother if you had a bad experience staying at the hotel, They would also try to charge you more. Don't stay in this hotel.

places_with_reviews.name: Shubham Hotel And Resort Jhalawar Road Baran

reviews.text: Perfect resort for marriage functions. Have huge open areas and nicely maintained halls. Open areas have beautifully designed stages. Rooms are of grand size with balcony and having all amenities.

I recently stayed at this hotel and it was fantastic. The room was really nice, with comfy furniture and a cool balcony. The staff were super friendly and helpful. Plus, the location was big and convenient. I had a really good time here!

The building is well maintained. The rooms are spacious and ventilation is good.
The view through the balcony is completely mesmerizing😍. It is definitely worth the price and I can't wait to spend another vacation stay there.
Nice Stay, rooms were super neat and clean

I personally like it the most, there is 26 ac room, all are well furnished along with balcony, there is 1 ac hall which can accommodate 250 people and another hall of 5000 sq. Feets.. I have attached my recent visited photographs, it was a great experience

reviews.text: Clean Spacious and well maintained rooms, Food quality and service also good. Best hotel in BARAN

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Radhika
address: National Highway 76, Kota Rd, Old Civil Line, Baran, Rajasthan 325215, India

reviews.text: Nice hotel delux room is for 900 only. Room size is Big. But I booked thru goibibo they charged 1500 for the same room. So friends I recommend to book room thru booking counter only. Owner is excellent. Staff is also very polite. There is no restaurant facility in this hotel. If we order food thru hotel they will charge 20% more on each item. Wines and bar are below 50feet only from this hotel.

Pathetic services. The condition of the mattresses provided is very bad and like that of a normal Dharamshala.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Sanskar - Best Hotel, Budget Hotel In Baran
address: Charmurti Chauraha, Kota Rd, Old Civil Line, Baran, Rajasthan 325205, India

reviews.text: Location is at the best place for commute in Baran. Rooms are well equipped. Don't expect more than 'a place to stay'.

Rooms and washroom are clean.
Open parking available at owners risk.
Location is at walking distance from bus stand and railway station.
Staff is prompt and cooperative.
One of the best hotel in Baran but washrooms are dirty

The hotel is located in a busy area. There are many competitors in vicinity. There 2 wings with each having about 20 rooms. There is no scenic views around the hotel nor there is an option in rooms for it. There is no restaurant in hotel but option for tea is available. Hotel has their own parking space at a distance of about 100 meter. All basic amenities available for night stay at reasonable price.
I don't know how they are active and still standing.

places_with_reviews.name: The Surya Hotel
address: Railway Station Road, Old Civil Line, Baran, Rajasthan 325205, India

reviews.text: I have had the experience of staying in about 1000 hotels in my life. I have had the experience of staying in all types of hotels in my 10 years of career. But the dirtiest and most dirty experience has been received in this hotel!! Rooms with foul smell from gutters and spitting of gutka on the walls tell the plight of this hotel. And what was worse than all this was the way the staff talked!! A better place to stay is the tin shed near the railway station.

Very nice hotel. Nice staff. Easily accessible from Bus Stand and Railway Station.
Service also good. Means complete stay hotel
Stayed during Transit. Rooms are ok. The bathroom fitment doesn't work properly even AC of the room doesn't work.

Hotel Surya is located near Baran Railway station just within walking distance.
Rooms are very ok, no Genset backup.
We have arrived here on stromy night and there was no electricity only on fan and a light was working with inverter.

There is also no food service it's only give rooms.
I have stayed in their Suite room which was big with living room.
Tv was not working but the mini fridge was.

if you are looking for just to crash for a night it can be an option.
It's nice hotel, feel like home

places_with_reviews.name: Krishna paradise hotel and resaurt

reviews.text:
Had a average experience in regards with the room facility and accommodation, however not well managed staff for all the needs like management of guards, cleaning staff, and during wedding they open the parking side gate due to which uninvited people enter the property, guards are not attentive, party needs to take care of most of the request on their on and need to look for management staff.

They might ask you a dedicated price at the time of booking, which may include the cleaning, decoration, guards price, etc as seen in image shared, however later they may ask you some extra amount at the time of your function.
